Issues.Title: Fix a bug introduced in the DesignerActionPanel refactoring
Issues.Body:
Fix a bug introduced in #10035

Fixes #10095
Fixes #10097

I refactored a bit the code to make the mistake more obvious.

- HeaderLine being a TextLine, HeaderInfo also needs to be a TextInfo

- I ran DemoConsole and verified manually that the bugs no longer reproduce

Issues.Title: Fix Narrator cannot select ComboBox's text area with Ctrl+a
Issues.Body:
Fixes #10007

## Proposed changes

- Base on PR 9970 https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/9970, we need update the ComboBox.Select() method to make sure the rectangeles for the selection text in TextBox can be correctly drawn.
- Update the method of ProcessCmdKey(ref Message m, Keys keyData) in TextBox class.

## Customer Impact

- When using keyboard: Ctrl+A or mouse to choose all texts in ComboBox, Narrator cannot focus entire texts and announce `<say-as interpret-as="spell">a</say-as>` to user

## Regression?

- Yes

## Risk

- Minimal

## Screenshots

### Before

![issue_10007](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/30190295/5e8c50ac-5ec7-4c68-afcf-a55aeb451ccb)

### After

![issue_10007_after](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/30190295/0f3ec828-6294-4cc3-88d8-95f220c08d52)

## Test methodology

- Manual (Narrator)

## Accessibility testing

## Test environment(s)

- 9.0.100-alpha.1.23511.2
